entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who needs to answer a letter quickly and is being urged by Harry to come with him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is asking Hermione if she will come with him and is also talking to Ron about his team's performance.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as not wanting to go into Hogsmeade because he needs to train with Angelina.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as the one who wants Ron to have a full day's training.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a place where Harry and Hermione are planning to go.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is mentioned as the place from which Hermione hurried out with a letter.

entities.name: letter
entities.description: A letter is mentioned as something that Hermione needs to answer quickly.

relationships.description: Harry asks Hermione if she will come with him.
Harry tries to be sympathetic towards Ron's plight.
Angelina is the team leader of Ron.
